mapper.select:
select
from sec_staff_department_role where 1 = 1 order by STAFF_ID desc
mapper.delete: delete from sec_staff_department_role where STAFF_ID = #{staffId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into sec_staff_department_role(STAFF_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, ROLE_ID ) values (#{staffId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{departmentId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT} )

insert into sec_staff_department_role
STAFF_ID,
DEPARTMENT_ID,
ROLE_ID,

mapper.update:
update sec_staff_department_role
STAFF_ID = #{staffId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId, jdbcType=BIGINT},

where STAFF_ID = #{staffId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
